## Installation
To download the STAT302package package, use the code below
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alishaluo/STAT302package")
library(STAT302package)
```

# my_t.test function
```{r}
my_t_test(my_gapminder$pop, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 60)
my_t_test(my_gapminder$pop, alternative = "less", mu = 60)
my_t_test(my_gapminder$pop, alternative = "greater", mu = 0)
```

Assuming that the null hypothesis ($\mu$ = 60) is true, 

# my_lm function
```{r}
my_lm(formula = lifeExp ~ gdpPercap + continent, data = my_gapminder)
```
